name: ScummVM Game Data File
summary: Learn about .ITK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ITK files typically contain either movies or speech data. They range from a few megabytes to several hundred megabytes in size.

description: Data file packaged for ScummVM, a virtual machine designed for playing old adventure games; contains data that has been reverse engineered from the original game file; saved in a proprietary ScummVM format that can be loaded by the ScummVM engine.
